response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $15,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you stands at $10,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. I kindly invite you to consider this offer and discuss how we might reach an agreement that respects both the intrinsic value of the product and your budget. Let's explore the possibilities together.", "product_price": 12000}
